issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description

When performing a macos build, we run simulator detection which is unnecessary to run. The check just needs updating to be aware of the macos target.

h5.Steps to reproduce

1. Build an app with {{-T macos}}
2. Check the logs

h5.Actual

You will see logs like {{No iOS Simulator UDID specified, searching for best match}} at the start

h5.Expected

No sim detection
fields.summary: iOS: simulator detection is ran when performing a macos build
